title: Can somebody help me convert my LOLReplay clip?
body:
I recently just recorded a really cool Lee Sin game where I carried but we still lost. Planning to upload to YT soon but the damn thing won't play the file. I've tried repairing it and it just gives me a ton of errors. Planning to switch to Baron Replays.

Can someone please help me convert the file into a MP4 or AVI?

I will give you my email as the Boards do not let me upload LOLReplay files.

replies.body:
go back to NA
jks, dont use LoLReplay, too buggy, get LSI its much better, i just switched

also, you cant convert a replay file to an .avi or .mp4, your gonna have to record your screen with another programme. Id suggest OBS which is free.
[Here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/R0QgN2o5-id-like-to-start-recording-by-league-games-so-i-can-re-watch-how-bad-i-am-whats-a-good-program?comment=0005) is a link on how to set it up.

EDIT: OBS RECORDER (just some keywords so that i dont have to look far in my post history to find the original post i made)

What file extension is it? just google epikleesinggame1337.file to .avi.

(replace file with w/e lolrecorder uses, im not good enough to record my games so I wouldn't know.)
